parameters.definition: Cost to make one premium desktop
Profit from selling one premium desktop
Cost to make one regular desktop
Profit from selling one regular desktop
Maximum number of desktops sold per month
Maximum budget for making desktops per month

description: A electronics store sells premium desktops with more power as well as regular desktops for everyday use. Each premium desktop costs the store \param{CostPremium} to make and yields a profit of \param{ProfitPremium}. Each regular desktop costs the store \param{CostRegular} to make and yields a profit of \param{ProfitRegular}. The store sells at most \param{MaxDesktops} desktops each month and wants to spend at most \param{MaxBudget} on making the desktops. How many of each should be made and sold to maximize profit?
